channel.title: Inventory model change
channel.description: Alright, I have a cloning system that clones an item it changes the name and all its itemdefs even models. I can't seem to find the method that would update the inventory. I have tried the resetItems method but that does not work. I have tried requesting the update method nothing. All though when I change region (Teleport to new region) the models update. I have no idea were to look, I have tried implementing some methods that were used in the changeRegions.java and changeRegion.java. Is this client sided? or server sided? and what method would be the correct one to use?

item.title: Inventory model change
